wikipedia_page.main: Peter Kenneth Newman (5 October 1928, Mitcham, Surrey, England – 6 November 2001, Hamilton, New Zealand) was an English economist and historian of economic thought. He helped to edit The New Palgrave: A Dictionary of Economics, to which he contributed several articles.

response: *Peter Kenneth Newman (1928–2001), English economist, historian of economic thought
